 2021-02862021-04-13,  ,  ,  ,  JUS,  CIRNAC, 
ActSpecific Claims Tribunal Act
PrecisAmendment to the Schedule of Order in Council P.C. 2010-1467 of November 25, 2010, as amended by Order in Council P.C. 2011-1714 of December 20, 2011, as amended by Order in Council P.C. 2016-359 of May 18, 2016, as amended by Order in Council P.C. 2019-900 of June 22, 2019, by adding the name of the HONOURABLE TODD DUCHARME to the roster of superior court judges who may act as members of the Specific Claims Tribunal.
